jparsec.graph

Class JPARSECStroke

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.JPARSECStroke
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class JPARSECStroke
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to support basic strokes, but adding serialization support. The set of strokes are (dotted points or lines) have widths of 1.5 pixels (normal strokes) or 0.5 (thin ones).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isContinuousLine

        public boolean isContinuousLine()
        Returns if this stroke represents a continuous line. More exactly, it returns true if the dash array has length 2 and the second value is 0.
        Returns:
        True or false.
